pkgmetadata.longdescription: Predictive Confidence Bands for Functional Time Series Forecasting // Functions to represent functional objects under a Reproducing Kernel Hilbert Space (RKHS) framework as described in Muoz Gonzlez (2010). Autoregressive Hilbertian Model for functional time series using RKHS and predictive confidence bands construction as proposed in Hernndez et al (2021).
